modName: ADEC body and textures for Ohmes-Raht Race
summary:
Zylch000\'s skin textures for the Ohmes-Raht Race and conversion to
   the Acdale EyeCandy Body ADEC
descriptionHtml:
Zylch000\'s skin textures for the Ohmes-Raht Race and conversion to
   the Acdale EyeCandy Body ADEC
   
   V1.3.2

===========================================

The body is based on the ADEC V2.2 body with TBBP.  Mesh and skeleton included here since the Ohmes-Raht race uses different directory resources.

Ohmes-Raht is the only version in the Ohmes-Raht Race mod that is changed.  I did not alter the Breed, Kitten or Kitling.


V1.3.2
------
 - Updated body mesh and skeleton to ADEC 2.3 (See notes from ADEC 2.3 update http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5390)

===========================================

Requirements (install first):

Ohmes-Raht Race - UNP CBBE by angelmeats
  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18418

===========================================

Installation:

1. Ohmes-Raht Race
2. Extract the archive and copy the containing meshes and textures folder to your skyrim/data folder.

===========================================

Credits:

Thanks to angelmeats for the Ohmes-Raht race!
  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18418

Thanks to Acdale for the body mod and meshes!
  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5390

===========================================

License:

 - Do not upload these textures to steam workshop or any other site.
 - No permission needed to use these textures in other mods or to modify and create your own textures. I just ask to be notified if you use it, credit me and post a link to the texture mod, to the ADEC body mod, and to the Ohmes-Raht mod.
author: Zylch000
